Controls cursor using volume keys in text fields

Allows to set custom background color for lockscreen
Allows to set custom background image for lockscreen
Disables intrusive LED flashing when battery is low and not charging
Allows to set minimum brightness level. Applies to manual brightness setting. (requires reboot)
Allows to set ambient light levels and corresponding LCD backlight values
It is not recommended to set brightness below %d
Values cannot be lower or equal to zero
Values on lower levels cannot be greater than values on higher levels
Values on higher levels cannot be smaller than values on lower levels
Allows hardware menu key to unlock device (requires reboot)
Contains various tweaks for media and audio system
Adds more volume steps for music stream (requires reboot)
Activates or deactivates safe headset media volume feature (requires reboot)
Allows to set custom actions on navigation keys (hardware and software)
Applies to Kill foreground app action. Defines for how long key must be pressed to trigger kill
Defines how fast key must be tapped to trigger double-tap
Allows to define action to be performed when device is flipped face down while ringing
Defines how many tiles to display per one row
When disabled, volumes for ringtone and notifications can be set independently

Edge of the status bar pulls down QuickSettings
Sets color for statusbar icons and clock
Sets color for data activity indicators
When disabled, R indicator will not be visible while roaming. Use with caution.
Always on while screen is on
EXPERIMENTAL! Blinks button backlight when there is a notification. Use in case your device lacks notification LED. May consume battery.
Disables single-tap on keys while Pie Controls are enabled
Switches GB UI to use dark theme
Amount of brightness for dim state - when screen is about to be turned off (requires reboot)
Use only in case your device supports standard Android brightness features. Keep disabled if you experience brightness related issues. (requires reboot)
Links notification panel clock to a specified app instead of Date&Time settings

GravityBox system framework not responding. Exiting.
Connect to data services when nationally roaming
Contains various navigation bar related tweaks
Applies to horizontal navigation bar and portrait orientation
Applies to horizontal navigation bar and landscape orientation

Defines SIM slot to which network mode tile applies (%s)
When expanded desktop hides navigation bar
If enabled, the screen will come on when you plug/unplug usb/power/whatever (requires reboot)
Allows blocking of selected ongoing notifications
The list will get populated automatically for every ongoing notification that occurs. You can then decide whether to block ongoing notification next time it occurs. Use with caution.
Are you sure you want to reset list? This will clear current list and unblock all ongoing notifications previously blocked.
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Auto (center or right depending on clock position)
Dialog allowing to define up to 12 apps which can be assigned as HW Key Action or used as additional navigation bar key
No apps assigned. Use GravityBox / Application launcher menu to assign apps.

Your screen might not support values lower than 20. If your screen doesn\'t light up, hold Volume+ key for at least 7 seconds to reset brightness and then adjust minimum brightness to use higher values.
Sets color for secondary data activity indicators
Applies to status icons like silent, vibrate, alarm, etc.
Touch to visit GravityBox Google+ community
In order to enable actions support for navigation bar, it is necessary to override system defaults in Navigation bar tweaks menu
Impossible to create launchable shortcut because activity did not return shortcut intent
Shortcut creation cancelled by target app
Cannot start new recording as previous recording is still being processed
Unable to save recording to output file
Shows dialpad automatically upon opening dialer app
Applies to stock launcher and Google Now launcher
Using other values than default may break widgets\' layout. Use wisely. Changes require launcher to be restarted.
Enables cursor control keys in navigation bar while keyboard is showing
Collapses statusbar automatically on tile single-tap. Applies to simple 2-state tiles.
Show summary and hide on inactivity
Indicates data activity on mobile and WiFi icons (requires reboot)
Set to zero for default (stock) behavior
When enabled, volume keys control media volume instead of ringer volume
Turns off torch after specified amount of time. Set to 0 to disable (not recommended)
Swap volume keys when the screen is rotated
This will automatically switch your radio to user-defined power saving mode or normal mode depending on mobile data and WiFi connection states (requires reboot)
Activates power saving mode when screen turns off regardless if mobile data is enabled or disabled
When screen turns on, power saving mode won\'t be deactivated until keyguard is unlocked
Delays changing of network mode by specified number of seconds
Delays switching to power saving mode when screen turns off. Overrides default network mode change delay if value is non-zero.
Your current preferences will be replaced. Are you sure?
Error generating app specific hash code
Error parsing data obtained from web service
Web service refused to communicate due to hash mismatch. This typically happens in case you run unofficial version or GravityBox APK has been modified by 3rd party.
Error parsing transaction data obtained from web service
Transaction ID verification succeeded. Premium features will be unlocked after GravityBox is restarted.
Unable to find record for specified transaction ID
Specified transaction ID has been registered too many times. Contact GravityBox dev to resolve.
Specified transaction ID has been blocked. Contact GravityBox dev to resolve.
In case you donated, you can enter your PayPal donation transaction ID to unlock premium features
This feature is premium and requires unlocking
Resize any widget to any size on the homescreen (requires launcher restart)
When there are no clearable notifications
Expands all notifications automatically when enabled
Whether to use microphone for audio input
Disables vibrate when adjusting notification/ringtone volume using volume keys
When enabled, stock screenrecord binary is used for recording. Use in case alternative binary causes issues. Note, that stock binary doesn\'t support audio and recordings longer than 3 minutes.
Toggles status bar clock settings (requires reboot)
Allows controlling notification lights, sounds and vibrations on per-app basis
Applies also to ongoing notifications when enabled
When enabled, the sound and/or vibration won\'t play in case notification already exists
When enabled, audio will be repeated until the notification is cancelled or the notification window is opened
Comma separated list of off/on duration pairs in milliseconds. Set to 0 to disable vibrations.
Comma separated list of off/on duration pairs in milliseconds. Leave empty for default vibration pattern.
Show red trail when wrong pattern is entered
This feature is in trial mode. If you find it useful you can continue using it after unlocking premium features. Trial period ends after %d reboots.
When on, default settings apply automatically to all applications that have no active explicit settings

Active Screen feature automatically turns on screen every time new notification arrives. Be aware that Active Screen requires lock screen to be enabled.\nThe switch below is a master switch. After it\'s enabled, additional configuration can be done on per-app basis
Mutes sounds/vibrations and optionally LED for all notifications arriving within defined time range
Shows icon in status bar during quiet hours
Comma separated list of keywords for which to ignore Quiet hours. Leave empty for all notifications.
Notice:\nAs the start volume is set higher than the ringer volume, the ring tone will be played using the ringer volume.
Forces LTR layout direction for RTL locales (requires reboot)
Thank you for your support. Premium features will be unlocked after system is restarted.
Don\'t have PayPal? Simply touch here to get GravityBox premium feature unlocker from the Play Store.
Switches to normal mode even if mobile data is currently unavailable
Icon pick cancelled by target app
Triggers pie only when swiping from center of the screen edge
Always keeps notifications quiet during user interaction (respecting per app ignore rules)
Activates extended heads up functionality. When enabled, additional per-app options become available within Ultimate notification control. (requires reboot)
For how long to show notification window. 0 = persistent.
Won\'t show any heads up while this app is in the foreground
Manages default settings of notifications for all apps that have no own per-app settings enabled
Manages settings of notifications on per-app basis overriding Default settings
Manages common settings for Active Screen feature
Cropping app did not deliver cropped image. Using original image.
If you choose no, original image willl be used as is. Make sure its dimensions are close to: %1$dx%2$dpx
Use proximity sensor to help decide whether to wake device up
Shows progress bar in status bar for standard Android Download Manager, bluetooth transfers and other apps that have Progress bar tracking enabled in Ultimate notification control
Make sure alternative method of turning expanded desktop off is available!!!
Stops recording automatically after specified amount of time. Set to 0 to disable.

FOR USE ON UNMODIFIED ANDROID OR GOOGLE PLAY EDITION DEVICES ONLY!

Use on any other heavily branded ROM like Touchwiz, Sense, Xperia, as well as on any custom ROM, is not supported and may cause unexpected results.

If you proceed, then you confirm it's at your own risk and without expectation of any support. For more detailed information on compatibility, see the support thread at XDA.
Won\'t turn screen on when proximity sensor is covered (e.g. when device is in the pocket)
This option is currently overriden by Proximity wake-up feature in Power tweaks
Automatically prolongs delay if current mobile data traffic exceeds defined threshold (Set to 0 to disable)
Shows progress bar in status bar for ongoing notifications that contain progress bar. Requires Progress bar feature in status bar tweaks to be enabled.
When progress bar in status bar is showing
Specifies the priority of the Wi-Fi networks
Determines color from current battery level automatically
Shows battery percent text in standard status bar (when device is unlocked)
Specifies behavior of percent text in lock screen status bar
Note that soft reboot can cause unexpected battery drain or instability issues. Best practice is to always use normal reboot.

GravityBox for Marshmallow found installed. Before new version can be used, old one has to be uninstalled. Press OK to start uninstallation process. After uninstallation, do not forget to activate new module in Xposed Installer and REBOOT IMMEDIATELLY.
Backup made in older version of Android cannot be restored due to extensive OS differences. It is highly recommended to configure GravityBox from scratch.
Always shows centered in lock screen
Shows security challenge directly when screen turns on
Specifies notification content visibility in secured lock screen. Applies only when \"Hide sensitive notification content\" lock screen policy is active
Requires double tap to launch shortcuts preventing them from being launched accidentally while e.g. device is in the pocket
Unlocks automatically when current smart lock policy detects trusted conditions
Disables orange color of system bars when battery saver is active
Prevents notifications having vibrations turned off from being forced to vibrate during vibrate-only ringer mode
Turns off ALL vibrations at system level, including notification vibrations, haptic feedback, etc.
Won\'t expand status bar on single-touch
You have decided to deny some of the permissions. Note that this will prevent related features from functioning.
Quick unlock needs to know the exact length of your PIN to work reliably
Defines vibration pattern in form of comma separated list of off/on duration pairs in milliseconds for camera launched from power key. Leave empty for default. Set to 0 to disable vibration.
Allows cycling through chosen do not disturb modes on tile single-press
Sets which do not disturb modes to cycle through
Allows cycling through location modes on tile single-press
Defines which network modes tile should support
Allows cycling through selected network modes on tile single-press
Defines which ringer modes tile should support
Allows cycling through selected ringer modes on tile single-press
Defines which screen timeouts tile should support
Allows cycling through selected screen timeouts on tile single-press
Applies overriden vibration only in case original notification has vibration
Applies overriden sound only in case original notification has sound
Hides all ongoing and other non-clearable notifications coming from this app
Fades keys automatically after timeout expires. Set to 0 to disable.
Sets default screen timeout automatically when screen turns off
Suppresses LED for chosen Do not disturb modes
Choose for which Do not disturb modes to keep LED off
Treats system as AOSP. Use in case your device is identified as running branded system despite it is actually running alternate AOSP-based system (requires reboot)
Shows icon indicating current brightness mode. Toggles adaptive brightness on single-press, opens display settings on long-press.
Won\'t perform Active screen when existing notification gets updated
Won\'t turn LED back on for existing notification already seen by user when it gets updated
Allows launching app or action using fingerprint sensor when screen is on and device is unlocked
Turns Fingerprint launcher feature on or off (requires reboot)
Fingerprint sensor locked due to too many authentication failures. Trying to restart in 35 seconds.
Pauses launcher until next screen off/on cycle. Use in case other app needs sensor for a longer time period, e.g. during fingerprint enrollment.
Launcher has been paused until next screen off/on cycle
Whether to show status messages in form of a toast
Plays notification sound when transfer is finished or interrupted
Plays notification sound only when screen is off

Allows toggling WiFi on tile single-press
Allows toggling Bluetooth on tile single-press
Logs all errors to Xposed log when enabled (requires reboot)
Enables haptic feedback on tile single-press
Enables tweaks for battery icon style and percentage (requires reboot)
Enables visualizer in lock screen while music is playing (requires reboot)
Extracts color from artwork of current song
Keeps lock screen active while visualizer is showing
Dims contents of lock screen after user inactivity timeout
Shows current media info on dimmed screen
Shows header containing current time and battery level on dimmed screen
Shows media playback controls on dimmed screen
Shows artwork covering lock screen contents on dimmed screen
Shows visualizer also in navigation bar
Defines how many tiles to display in header
When enabled, notifications matching ignoring rules won\'t be muted by quiet hours interactive mode
Manages list of contacts for which not to mute phone ringer during quiet hours
Allows to set time ranges and their rules for automatic quiet hours
There are currently no time ranges set
Allows to set rules for manual quiet hours
Allows advanced tuning of the Framework and System UI configuration parameters

Advanced tuner dynamically extracts all the configuration parameters from the Framework and System UI including their current values and allows the user to override them with own values. Tuning is currently available for simple types of parameters, such as integers and booleans. Overridden values will be applied during boot. The final result always depends on device type, relevant hardware support and vendor implementation; thus it is normal that changes to some parameters may not have any effect.

Advanced tuning is designed for power users only. Overriding default values and using incorrect values may lead to stability and performance issues and may even render your system unusable. Changes are not permanent and last only as long as GravityBox Xposed module is active and master switch is enabled. Use with caution and always have a backup plan!
Contains System UI specific configuration parameters related to status bar, lock screen, etc.
